descr: "This resource allows for the definition of various types of plans as a sharable, consumable, and executable artifact. The resource is general enough to support the description of a broad range of clinical artifacts such as clinical decision support rules, order sets and protocols."

fields.name: label
fields.descr: "A user-visible label for the action."

fields.name: _label
fields.descr: "Extensions for label"

fields.name: title
fields.descr: "The title of the action displayed to a user."

fields.name: _title
fields.descr: "Extensions for title"

fields.name: description
fields.descr: "A short description of the action used to provide a summary to display to the user."

fields.name: _description
fields.descr: "Extensions for description"

fields.name: textEquivalent
fields.descr: "A text equivalent of the action to be performed. This provides a human-interpretable description of the action when the definition is consumed by a system that may not be capable of interpreting it dynamically."

fields.name: _textEquivalent
fields.descr: "Extensions for textEquivalent"

fields.name: code
fields.descr: "A code that provides meaning for the action or action group. For example, a section may have a LOINC code for a the section of a documentation template."

fields.name: reason
fields.descr: "A description of why this action is necessary or appropriate."

fields.name: documentation
fields.descr: "Didactic or other informational resources associated with the action that can be provided to the CDS recipient. Information resources can include inline text commentary and links to web resources."

fields.name: goalId
fields.descr: "Identifies goals that this action supports. The reference must be to a goal element defined within this plan definition."

fields.name: _goalId
fields.descr: "Extensions for goalId"

fields.name: triggerDefinition
fields.descr: "A description of when the action should be triggered."

fields.name: condition
fields.descr: "An expression that describes applicability criteria, or start/stop conditions for the action."

fields.name: input
fields.descr: "Defines input data requirements for the action."

fields.name: output
fields.descr: "Defines the outputs of the action, if any."

fields.name: relatedAction
fields.descr: "A relationship to another action such as \"before\" or \"30-60 minutes after start of\"."

fields.name: timingDateTime
fields.descr: "An optional value describing when the action should be performed."

fields.name: _timingDateTime
fields.descr: "Extensions for timingDateTime"

fields.name: timingPeriod
fields.descr: "An optional value describing when the action should be performed."

fields.name: timingDuration
fields.descr: "An optional value describing when the action should be performed."

fields.name: timingRange
fields.descr: "An optional value describing when the action should be performed."

fields.name: timingTiming
fields.descr: "An optional value describing when the action should be performed."

fields.name: participant
fields.descr: "Indicates who should participate in performing the action described."

fields.name: type
fields.descr: "The type of action to perform (create, update, remove)."

fields.name: groupingBehavior
fields.descr: "Defines the grouping behavior for the action and its children."

fields.name: _groupingBehavior
fields.descr: "Extensions for groupingBehavior"

fields.name: selectionBehavior
fields.descr: "Defines the selection behavior for the action and its children."

fields.name: _selectionBehavior
fields.descr: "Extensions for selectionBehavior"

fields.name: requiredBehavior
fields.descr: "Defines the requiredness behavior for the action."

fields.name: _requiredBehavior
fields.descr: "Extensions for requiredBehavior"

fields.name: precheckBehavior
fields.descr: "Defines whether the action should usually be preselected."

fields.name: _precheckBehavior
fields.descr: "Extensions for precheckBehavior"

fields.name: cardinalityBehavior
fields.descr: "Defines whether the action can be selected multiple times."

fields.name: _cardinalityBehavior
fields.descr: "Extensions for cardinalityBehavior"

fields.name: definition
fields.descr: "A reference to an ActivityDefinition that describes the action to be taken in detail, or a PlanDefinition that describes a series of actions to be taken."

fields.name: transform
fields.descr: "A reference to a StructureMap resource that defines a transform that can be executed to produce the intent resource using the ActivityDefinition instance as the input."

fields.name: dynamicValue
fields.descr: "Customizations that should be applied to the statically defined resource. For example, if the dosage of a medication must be computed based on the patient's weight, a customization would be used to specify an expression that calculated the weight, and the path on the resource that would contain the result."

fields.name: action
fields.descr: "Sub actions that are contained within the action. The behavior of this action determines the functionality of the sub-actions. For example, a selection behavior of at-most-one indicates that of the sub-actions, at most one may be chosen as part of realizing the action definition."

fields.name: modifierExtension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element, and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions."
 derived from BackboneElement

fields.name: id
fields.descr:
"unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces."
 derived from Element
 derived from BackboneElement

fields.name: _id
fields.descr:
"Extensions for id"
 derived from Element
 derived from BackboneElement

fields.name: extension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension."
